meanings.definition: A sweet dessert made of milk, eggs, sugar, and flavorings.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious custard after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells custard tarts that are always popular.
meanings.sent3: The custard was so good, it made me dance with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as custard on a summer day.
meanings.sent5: The custard melted in my mouth, leaving a delightful taste.

meanings.definition: A thick, creamy substance used as a filling or topping for desserts.
meanings.sent1: The custard oozed out of the cake, making it even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: She spread custard on top of the pie for added richness.
meanings.sent3: The custard seemed to have a mind of its own, trying to escape the dessert.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as custard, calming everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The custard coated the spoon like a velvety blanket, comforting and warm.
